AppFunctionAppMetadata.appfn:description: * Use noSchema_enabledByDefault and noSchema_disabledByDefault for testing setAppFunctionEnabled API and enabledByDefault behavior. * Use noSchema_executionSucceed for testing successful execution. * Use noSchema_executionFail for testing execution failure. * Use notesSchema_print and mediaSchema_print for schema-based enabled functions. * Use mediaSchema2_print for testing a schema function disabled by default.
